text: John Edward Hollister Montagu, 11th Earl of Sandwich (11 April 1943 â€“ 1 February 2025) was a British businessman and politician. He was a crossbench member of the House of Lords from 1995 to 2024. Lord Sandwich died at Mapperton House in Dorset, England on 1 February 2025, at the age of 81. ==References== Category:1943 births Category:2025 deaths Category:Politicians from Dorset Category:British businesspeople
title: John Montagu, 11th Earl of Sandwich
